exceptions.exn: The LHS of Derive_n_comp (Derive_n (Derive_n _ _) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (n m : nat) (x : R), Derive_n (Derive_n f m) n x = Derive_n f (n + m) x f : R -> R n : nat x, b : R IHn : Derive_n (fun y : R => f (y + b)) n x = Derive_n f n (x + b) Unable to unify "Derive_n (fun y : R => f (y + b)) n x = Derive_n f n (x + b)" with "Derive (Derive_n (fun y : R => f (y + b)) n) x = Derive (Derive_n f n) (x + b)".

original: induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite Derive_n_comp. apply IHn.
